sum = 0; for (i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) { sum += arr[i]; }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
sum = 0
loop i from 0 to length(arr) - 1
    sum = sum + arr[i]
end loop

Java Code: max = arr[0]; for (i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) { if (arr[i] > max) { max = arr[i]; } }
Pseudocode Equivalent:
max = arr[0]
loop i from 1 to length(arr) - 1
    if arr[i] > max then
        max = arr[i]
    end if
end loop
